title: Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

details.overview: Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund
details.more_information:
##Instructions

^To fill in the tax disc refund form you'll need to type in your personal details exactly as they are shown on your Registration Certificate (V5C), so it's a good idea to have the certificate handy.^

Instructions on how to print the form and where to send it are included on the form.
details.introduction:
Fill in the vehicle tax disc (vehicle licence) refund form V14, print it off and send to DVLA to get your refund.

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
expectations: Details of your current Blue Badge, if you have one
